# MTLArgumentBuffersTier.tier1

**Case**

Support for tier 1 argument buffers.

## Declaration

```swift
case tier1
```

## Discussion

Tier 1 argument buffers are supported on all iOS, tvOS, and macOS GPUs.

## Enumeration cases

- **MTLArgumentBuffersTier.tier2**: Support for tier 2 argument buffers.
title: MTLArgumentBuffersTier.tier1
